jcr:content.jcr:description: The new Paradigm 7 combines a sleek redesign with supportive features. Plus, Kara Goucher’s “Hope” color lends support to an important charity.
jcr:content.jcr:title: New Paradigm 7 Road Running Shoes

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Loved by Kara. Inspired by hope.

New stylish look. Same sturdy support. The new Paradigm 7 features a fresh and sleek redesign and a “hopeful” color that helps support a charity close to Kara Goucher’s heart.

video.description: Sizzle reel for the new Paradigm 7
video.name: Kara paradigm 7

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Hey, good lookin’


This modern redesign features an engineered mesh upper for breathability and ghillie lacing for a confident and secure fit. Molded heel construction with plush detailing and premium lining materials encourages a soft step-in feel. Who knew support could be so sleek?

image.alt: Women's Hope Colorway of the paradigm 7

customhtml2_copy_cop_1246837796.customHTML:
Light and luxurious


The new Paradigm 7 features 30 mm of updated Altra EGO™ MAX midsole foam. Light on the weight but heavy on the comfort, this midsole is responsive and luxurious with every supportive step. Our Standard FootShape™ Fit gives your toes the space they need to spread out and achieve natural foot position.

image.alt: Women's Hope Colorway top view of the paradigm 7

customhtml2_copy_cop_1947719730.customHTML:
Support that’s supportive


Our unique GuideRail™ technology offers medial guidance, but only when you need it. Think of it like train tracks for your feet, encouraging natural foot placement. For every pair sold in Kara Goucher’s signature “Hope” color, Altra will donate $5 to benefit the Bachmann-Strauss Fellowship in Dystonia Research, a training program by The Michael J. Fox Foundation growing the global base of researchers studying the movement disorder dystonia.*

*up to $50,000

image.alt: Women's Hope Colorway side view of the paradigm 7
Kara holding the paradigm in a sunny park
